TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Stephen F Austin, 08-20-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Austin, August 20, 1828. Acknowledging Austin's report of expedition to arrest men wanted in the United States. (Omitted.)
